wikipedia_page.main: Lavinia Clara Radeglia was an English badminton player. Born in Kensington in 1879 she first played badminton in 1903 at the Richmond Badminton Club. She became an England international in 1909 and won four All England titles. She was a one time editor of the Badminton Gazette and a well known Lawn Tennis player and became a professional tennis coach. She died in 1947 at Budleigh Salterton, aged 68.
